title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 126 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 126 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: When the LORD turned again the captivity of Zion, we were like them that dream.
lineList.cn: （上行之诗）当耶和华将那些被掳的带回锡安的时候，我们好像做梦的人。

lineList.en: Then was our mouth filled with laughter, and our tongue with singing: then said they among the heathen, The LORD hath done great things for them.
lineList.cn: 我们满口喜笑，满舌欢呼的时候，外邦中就有人说，耶和华为他们行了大事。

lineList.en: The LORD hath done great things for us; whereof we are glad.
lineList.cn: 耶和华果然为我们行了大事，我们就欢喜。

lineList.en: Turn again our captivity, O LORD, as the streams in the south.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你使我们被掳的人归回，好像南地的河水复流。

lineList.en: They that sow in tears shall reap in joy.
lineList.cn: 流泪撒种的，必欢呼收割。

lineList.en: He that goeth forth and weepeth, bearing precious seed, shall doubtless come again with rejoicing, bringing his sheaves with him.
lineList.cn: 那带种流泪出去的，必要欢欢乐乐地带禾捆回来。
